title: Candle in the Tomb: The Weasel Grave
overview: A middle-aged Hu Ba Yi found an old photograph when he was packing. The memory brought him back to his young college days in the 1960s, to his first adventure with his best friends Wang Kai Xuan and Ding Si Tian, his meeting with a cold and mysterious girl Hua Mei, that led him to became a tomb expert in the future.
